table.name: vtiger_bhsagentmonitoring
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_bhsagentmonitoring` ( `bhsagentmonitoringid` int(19) NOT NULL, `bhsagentmonitoring_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bhsagentmonitoringid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_bhsagentmonitoringcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_bhsagentmonitoringcf` ( `bhsagentmonitoringid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bhsagentmonitoringid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
